mapper.insert: insert into memberinfo(userid, userpw, nickname, email) values(#{userid}, #{userpw}, #{nickname}, #{email})
insert into test_log(imgname, userid, AggAmx, SocialAnx, SadAnx, CompleAnx, RegAnx, diagnosis_result) values(#{imgname}, #{userid}, #{AggAmx}, #{SadAnx}, #{CompleAnx}, #{RegAnx}, #{diagnosis_result})
